title: Miscellany
author: Ibn Gabirol
description: Contents:  Abridgment of the chapter on chronology (IV.18) in Isaac Israeli's Sefer Yesod ʻOlam (ff. 1-2). Joseph ben Judah ben Jacob Ibn Aknin's Introduction to the Talmud (ff. 3-8v). Joseph ben Judah ben Jacob Ibn Aknin's Treatise on weights and measures (ff. 8v-10r). Rashi's Commentary on Rabbi Ishmael's Thirteen Exegetical Rules (ff. 10r-11r). Qalonymos ben Qalonymos ben Meʼir's Even Boḥan (ff. 11v-34r). Jedaiah ben Abraham Bedersi's Igeret Beḥinat ʻOlam (ff. 34r-40r). Ibn Gabirol's Sefer Tiḳun Midot ha-Nefesh (ff. 40r-50r). On the flyleaf, a table of contents and a quote from Maimonides's Mishneh Torah, Sefer Nashim. Ishut. 10.8.
